name: Monster Cakes' Attack
description:
“Monster Cakes’ Attack” puts you at the forefront of a battle against invading monster cakes. You will take control of a fearful and beautiful creature and must protect your planet and save your nation from extinction. 

To accomplish this task, you should defeat all the enemies, destroy the bosses. You will be faced with a large number of projectiles and enemies, especially beware meteorites, they are deadly dangerous! 

As the game progresses you will have the opportunity not only to upgrade your creature, but also take a part in creating your next game character!

by Anastassiya Voronova
